_header: When our lord Jesu so free
Note: For the ordinary text see 6298; for an independent version see 6422.
Subjects: sermon texts, Gospel; Epiphany, feast of
_description: Gospel, ‘In die Epiphanie’, in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BLHar4196.First Lines: When oure lord ihesu so freWas born in Bedleem of Iude…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …And by þis way wele may we wendevnto oure regne with outen ende
BLHar4196.Note: Preceded by Latin “Cum natus esset ihesu crist in bethleem.”
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: In die Epiphanie Secundum Matheum (rubric, f. 28rb)
